entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or ice pellets. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 40%
